trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of expressions to apply to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 表示表达式的值以应用于数据源控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a data source expression object to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式将对象添加到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to add.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式要添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object contains a specific data source expression object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>对象包含特定的数据源表达式对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式要定位的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Copies elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object to an array, starting at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: 将复制的元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>到一个数组中从特定索引处开始的对象。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 该数组必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements that are copied.
trans-unit.target: 一维数组，它是复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 开始复制处的数组中的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a data source expression object.
trans-unit.target: 创建数据源表达式对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array where the data source expression object is located.
trans-unit.target: 中的数据源表达式对象所在的数组的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source expression to create from the ordered list of types returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes*> method.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型的有序列表创建的数据源表达式索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of data source expression objects that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据源表达式对象的数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>对象可以包含。

trans-unit.source: An ordered array of data source expression objects that the data source collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: 数据源集合可以包含的数据源表达式对象的有序的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a specified data source expression object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的数据源表达式对象中的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to locate.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式要定位的对象。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source expression object, if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式对象，如果它是集合; 中的索引否则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a data source expression object into an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将插入到数据源表达式对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the object should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，应在此处插入对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的数据源表达式对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source expression object at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的数据源表达式对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data source expression to get.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引的数据源表达式来获取。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源表达式的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner control.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有者控制。

trans-unit.source: The owner control.
trans-unit.target: 所有者控制。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified data source expression object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除从指定的数据源表达式对象的第一个匹配项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的数据源表达式对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes a data source expression object at a specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除从指定索引处的数据源表达式对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data source expression to remove.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引的数据源表达式以删除。

trans-unit.source: Marks a specified data source expression object as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源表达式对象作为最后一个以来已发生更改的标记加载或保存从视图状态的操作。

trans-unit.source: The data source expression object to mark as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
trans-unit.target: 要将标记为最后一个以来已发生更改的数据源表达式对象加载或保存从视图状态的操作。
